name: I Became the Successor of the Martial God
author: Grubam
content: One day, I suddenly became the protagonist of a game. However, the more you look at this protagonist... the more you&#039ll sigh. He&#039s got the worst stats, the worst talent and zero connections. But still… You have acquired [Heavenly Martial Physique]. You have become the master of the [Martial God&#039s Tome]. “So what? I’m the ultimate veteran player!” He&#039s not just a veteran player— he’s a full-blown obsessive maniac. Thus begins the legendary playthrough of a hardcore veteran!
